title: Over 1,000 Android apps now available on Windows 11 w/ Amazon Appstore Preview
content:
After confirming the move some time ago, Microsoft has officially announced that over 1,000 Android apps are now available on the Windows 11 operating system via the Amazon Appstore Preview.

more…

The post Over 1,000 Android apps now available on Windows 11 w/ Amazon Appstore Preview appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Microsoft has confirmed that over 1,000 Android apps are now available on the Windows 11 operating system via the Amazon Appstore Preview.
